## PhD Researcher
<span style="font-size:1.15rem; color:#4b5563;">
Granular Flow Â· DEM Simulations Â· Pattern Formation
</span>

**Research Focus:** I work in computational granular physics using DEM simulations. My research focuses on how particle shape and friction govern rheology, alignment, secondary flow, and stress anisotropy in dense granular flows. I analyze simulation data using coarse-graining to obtain continuum fields and relate microstructure to bulk behavior.

My work includes scientific programming, data analysis and visualization, machine learning, and high-performance computing for computational modeling.

**Currently:** PhD Researcher (Germany)
